prompt: What type of animal is renowned for having thick skin?
icl_complete: An animal renowned for having thick skin is the rhinoceros. Rhinos have notoriously tough, thick skin that can be nearly 2 inches thick in some areas. This thick skin acts as a natural armor, protecting them from predators and environmental hazards.
judgement: The completion correctly identifies an animal with thick skin and provides relevant details.
